text: @WhiteHouse The Trump administration allowed coronavirus-infected people on the same plane as uninfected individuals, then had federal workers assist them without any proper training or safety precautions. Pence, who did not properly handle the HIV epidemic in his state, is in charge. https://t.co/5h1yybAdjd

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
